channel.title: [shard][creativescape client] help ! [client exits after 2 click] [help]
channel.description:
Okay guys, i've been ingame i saw the gameframe and starter items or whatever ..... but i tried to walk and after click the ground or anywhere two times !!! my client automatically exits and got this message from the cmd of client wtf ... im using the creativescape source and client ....
[code]Guys, i got this error. I've already been ingame but when i did 2 click in the game to walk, my client exits and got this message from the cmd
[code]# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d8e7786, pid=1356, t id=656 # # JRE version: 6.0_21-b07 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.0-b17 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x57786] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Program Files (x86)\Adobe\Reader 9.0\lance\client\hs_err_pid1356.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Anyone could help me fix pls??

item.title: [shard][creativescape client] help ! [client exits after 2 click] [help]
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Dude wrong section client sided.

Read full topic

item.title: [shard][creativescape client] help ! [client exits after 2 click] [help]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Download the 32-bit version of Java and use that instead of the 64-bit.

Read full topic
